function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Misinformation about pandemic management","Impact":"Increased risk of promoting ineffective safety measures","Mitigation":"Establishing reliable sources of information and fact-checking","Technologies":"Data analytics and artificial intelligence for detecting misinformation","People":"General population","Owner":"Health organizations and tech companies"},{"Description":"Lack of contact tracing","Impact":"Inability to control the spread of the virus","Mitigation":"Implementing effective contact tracing technologies and protocols","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps and GPS tracking","People":"General population","Owner":"Health organizations and government authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of communication with vulnerable groups","Impact":"Isolation and lack of support for sick or elderly individuals","Mitigation":"Using communication technologies to maintain contact with vulnerable groups","Technologies":"Social networks, messaging apps, and telecommunication systems","People":"Sick or elderly individuals","Owner":"Health organizations and support services"}]}
